companies.title: IT Student Intern
tasks: Assisted in developing and maintaining web applications as part of an internship program.
Collaborated with senior developers to implement new features and resolve bugs in existing projects.
Participated in code reviews and contributed to the improvement of code quality and application performance.
Gained hands-on experience with front-end and back-end technologies including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP.
Worked with databases to retrieve and manage data effectively in web applications.
Engaged in team meetings to discuss project progress, challenges, and learning experiences.

companies.title: Capstone Project Member
tasks: Contributed to the development of a web-based Barangay Information and Management System for Barangay Bosongon.
Collaborated with team members to design, develop, and test the application using Laravel, MySQL, and Bootstrap.
Assisted in gathering requirements from stakeholders and implementing solutions to meet project objectives.
Participated in regular meetings to discuss project progress and address any technical challenges.
Focused on improving the efficiency, transparency, and accessibility of barangay services through the digital platform.

companies.title: Participant
tasks: Attended the DICT seminar held at HNU Tagbilaran.
Gained insights into the latest developments and trends in information and communications technology.
Networked with industry professionals and other participants to exchange knowledge and experiences.

companies.title: CAST Department Auditor
tasks: Served as the Auditor for the CAST Department, managing financial records and audits.
Participated in the development and implementation of financial policies and procedures.
Collaborated with department leaders to ensure accurate and transparent financial reporting.
